comments.comment: Ubalata thivanka mllita una asadarane penne neththam ubalath e godema un thama.ape gedarin api 3 denekutama vote karanna beri una.doshayaklu.ethakota eva.vote block karala eva hodada?kochchara hodata kiuvath ekata hoda ne.ke gahanavalu.varadinava.u hariyatama hari.ke gahannema ne.thivankava ain karanna one nisa ema kale.diulapitiye apith.me rate,pitarata idan thivankata vote karapu hemotama une eka.hodak venna epa.api thivanka ekka.hema velema hemoma ekama de kiya kiya apahasuthavata path karanavata kemathida.thivankata loku janathavak innava.iyhin e katath me vena asadarane balan inna be.karanna deyak ne pandithakamai.kuhakamai.vedi unama guti kanna venava.mukuth vela ne.samahara vita gahanna hadanna athi kauruhari.eth vedila ne.
